description: This file defines Express.js routes for managing 'books' in a bookstore backend API, including CRUD operations and associated Swagger API documentation.

methods.name: GET /
methods.description: Handles retrieving a list of books with optional search, filters, and pagination.

methods.name: GET /:id
methods.description: Retrieves a specific book by its ID.

methods.name: POST /
methods.description: Creates a new book, requiring authentication.

methods.name: PUT /:id
methods.description: Updates an existing book by ID, requiring authentication.

methods.name: DELETE /:id
methods.description: Deletes a book by ID, requiring authentication.
